"api response to csv file i want to pass this api response to a simple csv file:..[[1467167400,576.01,576.01,576.01,576.01,0.72],.[1467166200,579.03,579.03,579.03,579.03,0.02],.[1467165900,580,580,580,580,1.6505],.[1467165600,580,580.53,580.53,580.01,0.5467],.[1467165000,584,584.63,584.63,584,10.438751879999998],.[1467164700,585,586.48,586.48,585,1.0923],.[1467164100,585,587.72,587.3,587.72,2.61],.[1467163800,587.66,587.66,587.66,587.66,0.04],.[1467163200,588.02,588.02,588.02,588.02,0.2],.[1467162600,587.84,587.84,587.84,587.84,0.16],.[1467162000,588.1,588.26,588.26,588.1,0.12000000000000001]]...and i want a csv file like this:..2017-05-28 14:00:00 utc,1922.51735897436,1961.0,1879.01.2017-05-28 15:00:00 utc,1869.88877403846,1906.28,1827.14.2017-05-28 16:00:00 utc,1860.06581132075,1897.83,1833.81.2017-05-28 17:00:00 utc,1885.3259798995,1906.99,1859.01.2017-05-28 18:00:00 utc,1881.34923469388,1907.32,1859.01.2017-05-28 19:00:00 utc,1887.00946153846,1905.82,1867.04.2017-05-28 20:00:00 utc,1854.78940860215,1877.0,1840.01.2017-05-28 21:00:00 utc,1870.5975,1886.99,1845.36.2017-05-28 22:00:00 utc,1899.98381756757,1921.44,1875.97.2017-05-28 23:00:00 utc,1923.40009009009,1940.03,1906.86...how can i easily do this? and if i want to change the order of the rows, like low price change to high price and vice versa?"
